name: StatsHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask Stats Helper to record 193.2”
”Alexa, ask Stats Helper for a summary”
”Alexa, ask Stats Helper to clear my data”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stats helper
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill can be used to record and summarize any list of numbers, but it's especially good for keeping track of noisy measurements like weights and times.
